Ref:
When you pass the logical ID of this resource to the intrinsic Ref function, Ref returns the name of the AppImageConfig.

For more information about using the Ref function, see Ref.

GetAtt.Description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the AppImageConfig, such as arn:aws:sagemaker:us-west-2:account-id:app-image-config/my-app-image-config-name.
